item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

3/21/2011 location - Cafe Goodfella's

Café Good Fellas is a seductive Italian restaurant in Downtown New Haven.  The restaurant offers a very great ambiance with music and movies playing coupled with a relaxed lounge atmosphere.  And if you're feeling hungry feel free to check out their menu with dishes ranging from tasty bruschetta to their famous meat ball salad.  Located at 758 State St, there is ample parking directly across the street. So let’s all come out and enjoy the evening!

The nice manager at Cafe Goodfella's has promised us.... some type of TBD special.  Oooo mystery : D

Here's a link to their website their website.

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.  If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour events please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Special thanks to Robert for setting up this event! We appreciate any and all people who set up and host events for the group.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: How to find us: We're probably one of if not the largest groups of people at the bar on a Monday. You can also Call/look for the "Contact/host" (Robert in this case), cell phone number listed in RSVP.
item.name: Cafe Goodfella's Happy hour!
